title: Will riot ever do skin trading with friends
body:
I have heaps of unwanted skins and my friends don't have skins for them and i have no use for them for example Rumble i have both bilge water rumble and super galaxy rumble which i never use the bilgewater skin, And most champs i have like from 3-4 skins for them which i really want to give to friends but there is no way you can.

Is there by any chance we are able to trade skins or give skins away the ones we own??

replies.body:
it would be cool if you could, but say for a transfer fee of 200-400rp
(paid by the receiver of course)

LOL "will Riot ever implement an idea that allows people to instead of SPENDING MONEY simply pass around skins?"

uhhh.... No, they won't.

Same idea with people asking, "Why can't I give someone IP or gift using IP". Same thing. How does this profit Riot as a company in any way?

I don't think riot should do something like this. It will make it too easy for people to hack someone else's account and to just send all their skins to someone else. I think they should implement something similar to the skin boost in aram. We should be able to LEND our skins to people for a single game.

It is an interesting idea.  I am all for it.
